name: Ship builder
description:
A game that uses realish water physics to let you simulate a custom built boat

Controls:

Esc to open menu

Editing:

WASD to move your camera, drag right click to look around

Left click to place, X to delete, R T and Y to rotate, and Scroll to change block

Sailing

W and S to control throttle when in water

Drag left click to look around
